EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Security for Microservices with Spring and OAUTH2 10AM.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Security for Microservices with Spring and OAUTH2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for the webinar Security for Microservices with Spring and OAUTH2. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, November 4, 2014
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=295906153> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 295 906 153
Thank you,
